mdRecord.dcterms:title: A north view of Pensacola, on the Island of Santa Rosa / drawn by Dom. Serres. Plan of the Harbour and settlement of Pensacola / T. Jefferys sculp
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sayer, Robert, 1725-1794
Serres, Dominic, 1719-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 view and 1 map on a single sheet
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On the Plan of the Harbour... "Plate 2" is printed at upper left above the neatline and "Page 9" is printed at upper right, also above the neatline.
Relief shown pictorially; depth by soundings.
A north view of Pensacola includes notes: 1. The Fort. 2. The Church. 3. The Government house. 4. The Commandants House. 5. A Well. 6. A Bungo.
According to Phillips, these appeared in "A general topography of North America and the West Indies." London, for R. Sayer & T. Jefferys, nos. 68 a and b.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
Scale for Plan of the Harbour... [ca. 1:168,000]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Nautical charts--Florida--Pensacola--Early works to 1800.
Views--Early works to 1800.
Florida--Maps--Early works to 1800.
